Text.Page:
We're in urgent need of antidotes hereâ€”naga claws are venomous and cause a most agonizing death.

The adderfungus we need grow deep in the temple, but the {@LinkCreature:42#500#vigilant chikas} have kept me from most of them.

I'd appreciate any help you can give in thinning their numbers a bit.
Thank you. The gathering will go faster and easier now.
